metadata.name: Potential WinAPI Calls Via CommandLine
metadata.comment: Detects the use of WinAPI Functions via the commandline. As seen used by threat actors via the tool winapiexec

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('addsecuritypackage')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('adjusttokenprivileges')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('advapi32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('closehandle')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createprocesswithtoken')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createpseudoconsole')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createremotethread')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createthread')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createuserthread')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dangerousgethandle')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('duplicatetokenex')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enumeratesecuritypackages')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('freehglobal')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('freelibrary')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getdelegateforfunctionpointer')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getlogonsessiondata')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getmodulehandle')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getprocaddress')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getprocesshandle')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gettokeninformation')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('impersonateloggedonuser')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kernel32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('loadlibrary')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('memcpy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('minidumpwritedump')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntdll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('opendesktop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openprocess')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openprocesstoken')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openthreadtoken')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openwindowstation')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ptrtostring')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('queueuserapc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('readprocessmemory')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reverttoself')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rtlcreateuserthread')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('secur32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('setthreadtoken')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('virtualalloc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('virtualfree')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('virtualprotect')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('waitforsingleobject')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('writeint32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('writeprocessmemory')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zerofreeglobalallocunicode'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\mpcmdrun.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getloadlibrarywaddress32'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of WinAPI Functions via the commandline. As seen used by threat actors via the tool winapiexec
